div.head: A good clearing for the eyes:
div.ab: Take tuzia parparta (perhaps some sort of Tutty? Parpata is an Indian plant?) and aloer mira (aloe vera?) toris(???) and aneh(?) from every two drmi(???) and (???) and mix it all together and put it in the eye. So will he be healed, certainly.

Take tuzia parparta (perhaps some sort of Tutty? Parpata is an Indian plant?), two ounces and a half ounce canapar(??? cinnabar?), and a lot [about an ounce?] and a half of rose water, and as much(?) white wine, and mix it all together very fully and put it in the eye. So will he be healed, certainly.

Another clearing: take [the] root of fennel and the root of peytersen(?) and mill/grind(???) and crush it and take juice from it and when he wants to go to sleep, he must put(?) three drops in(???) the eye. So will he [be] healed, certainly.
